tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Mixed Messages
programme.desc: An intruder shoots three Navy people, killing two. One of the dead is a friend of Harm, who protects his reputation. Webb, counter-espionage, and disinformation are involved; Bud solves it. Mac and Renee return to town; Mac leaves again.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Jag-a-thon
programme.desc: The JAG gang takes part in a JAGathon, a charity-benefit marathon, which provides opportunities for personal pride and individual competitiveness. Sturgis feels uncertain, and Harm defends a sailor for impersonating an officer.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Mission
programme.desc: A spotter on the ground calls for an airstrike as he has identified 15 heavily armed suspected Al Qaeda members on horseback. JAG won’t approve the airstrike until the spotter is absolutely certain the men are Al Qaeda members.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Defending His Honor
programme.desc: An ambulance pulls up to a crash site where a woman, Jennifer Wilson, is found injured and crying for her baby. Unbeknownst to her, the six-month-old baby died in the accident. A Navy judge stands accused of vehicular homicide.(n)

programme.title: JAG: In Country
programme.desc: Central Command coordinates an airstrike on a confirmed target traveling through Afghanistan. After the strike is launched, marine troops assess the damage and they are disturbed to learn that they targeted the wrong vehicle and hit civilians instead.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plutonium Is Forever
programme.desc: To fix a Los Angeles nuclear reactor that's on the verge of a cataclysmic meltdown, Walter and the team must reluctantly enlist the help of a troubled former member.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: True Colors
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must pass a mandated psych evaluation or face being disbanded after they're accused of destroying a priceless work of art in an attempt to protect an art exhibit.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Father's Day
programme.desc: A case gets personal for Team Scorpion when three convicts break out of prison and one of them is a brilliant hacker who was forced to help the others steal billions online.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Risky Business
programme.desc: Team Scorpion enlists the help of a musician who created a controversial algorithm that generates hit songs to help find the murderer of a music blogger.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Rogue Element
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must help protect Cabe's ex-wife after she uncovers evidence that suggests foul play in the death of a prominent congressman.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Talismans
programme.desc: When a military plane is shot down in Bosnia, Team Scorpion must help recover its stealth technology before it falls into enemy hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted Halloween Special - 2022
programme.desc: The multi award winning, worldwide phenomena, Most Haunted, continues its successful run with another paranormal first, Halloween Live special!!(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Tired from this long investigation, the team continue where one of them realises that the idea to investigate along was a mistake, but can the others get there in time. And something has a final message for the team as they leave.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Haunted Reform School
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters the TAPS team investigates Preston Castle, a once notorious reform school for boys in Northern California.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dark Shadows
programme.desc: The TAPS' team is called out to Newport, RI to hold the first ever-paranormal investigation at Seaview Terrace; best recognized from the TV show Dark Shadows.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roasts and Ghosts
programme.desc: The TAPS team is the first paranormal team to ever investigate the famed Friar's Club in New York City. Next, the team travels to the Main Street Armory in Rochester, New York.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Edith Wharton Estate
programme.desc: TAPS is the first team to investigate The Mount in Lenox, MA, the astounding estate of famous author Edith Wharton.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Be All My Sins Remembered
programme.desc: A body identification goes awry when it turns out Beka's former crewmate isn't dead at all.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Dance of the Mayflies
programme.desc: Andromeda rescues dying people from a drift, but they soon turn into zombies being controlled by a hive-mind.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: In Heaven Now Are Three
programme.desc: The engine of creation is capable of rewriting the universe according to the owner's wishes. Dylan, Beka and Trance must obtain it before someone with dark plans gets it.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Things We Cannot Change
programme.desc: A black hole knocks out Dylan and sends him into an alternative reality with a wife and child.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Fair Unknown
programme.desc: The crew rescues one of the long-lost founders of the Commonwealth, but discovers she may be more trouble than she is worth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.167
programme.desc: Woman claims ex-husband owes $16k in child support arrears; he sues for overpayment. Man sues alleged bar assailant; defendant claims Good Samaritan role.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.146
programme.desc: A man denies popping the tires and smashing the truck windows of his ex-girlfriend’s new boyfriend’s vehicle in a jealous rampage.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers accuse each other of having drug problems during a fight over an alleged loan for a motorcycle.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.24
programme.desc: Babysitter accused of falsely claiming ex-employer smoked marijuana in front of child/Gallery owner denies scamming customer, claims heirloom sapphire sold for alleged ten dollars.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.177
programme.desc: Woman's front teeth cracked when intoxicated dancer trips and knocks into her at bar. Dancer denies wrongdoing. 15-year-old accused of breaking pizzeria window denies involvement but refuses to implicate friend. Police provide different account.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.210
programme.desc: Unwed parents fight over the return of furniture, an unpaid cell phone bill, and an incarcerated ex-boyfriend.\t\t\t\r\nA landlord is suing a former tenant for damage to her rental property.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.186
programme.desc: A young man denies killing a teen's dog during their graduation party. Intoxicated teenagers prompt neighbors to call police, leading to a dispute over a broken apartment lease between feuding ex-roommates.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.241
programme.desc: A man describes his relationship as "friends with benefits" with a woman who claims she lent him money for living expenses. A woman sues her former live-in boyfriend for home renovation costs and furniture expenses.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.84
programme.desc: A contract between cousins to ‘share’ a Pontiac Grand Am ends with a fight over the return of the car with allegedly ‘missing’ speakers/A fight over a three-way gym membership leaves a young woman at odds with her ex-boyfriend and his best friend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.178
programme.desc: Two women fight at a Halloween party over wearing the same costume, disputing their relationship with the Sheriff’s department. A woman crashes her co-worker's car into oncoming traffic, admitting she was driving without a license.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.218
programme.desc: A man is allegedly chased out of a bar and viciously attacked after being accused of stealing a woman’s purse.\t\t\t\r\nA man hits black ice and has a wreck in his brother’s ex-girlfriend’s car; she sues him for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.137
programme.desc: Alleged assault, vandalism, and marijuana use are the source of\t\t\t\r\ncontention between a woman and her nephew’s ex-girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The wannabe chefs must combine their skills and work as individuals for the first time. The prize is a trip with Chef Ramsay to get a taste of the restaurant at the Red Rock Casino Resort.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants must create a meal fit for service in 15 minutes out of a tray of leftovers from the previous night.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final three contestants must serve an entire dining room.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay divides Hell's Kitchen between the two remaining contestants, who design a decor and a menu, then come up with names for their halves.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Six men and six women try to impress head chef Gordon Ramsay to earn a post as executive chef of a fine restaurant in Las Vegas.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Legal Repossession
programme.desc: First, Matt, Froy, and Lou do a legal repossession of an attorney's car. Next, Froy, Lyndah, and Sonia are speechless when they interrupt two girls in the back of a car. And finally, Lou and Sonia wrangle with a bunch of confused ATV owners blindsided by.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Business Issues
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou deal with a terrible boss and his instigating employees. Next, Lou, Froy, and Lyndah deal with a debtor with issues when they take possession of a taco truck. And Finally, Matt, Lou, and Sonia take on a big repo at a dealership and...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Wrench in the Works
programme.desc: First, a wrench is thrown in the works, and at the car, when Froy and Matt try to repo from a plumber. Then, the duo goes out again to try to repo a car from a slap-happy debtor, but unfortunately, the car has a boot on it. And finally, Froy, Matt, Lyndah.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Wooby
programme.desc: Audrey surprises Jeff by making quilt out of his old t-shirts but regrets her gift when he doesn't stop telling the stories that are behind the shirts.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mr. Fix-It
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey tackle marital communication issues while Adam and Jennifer discover whether creating a home-made 'videotape' will spice up their love life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting With Disaster
programme.desc: Adam enjoys stealing the attention of Russell's female admirers, prompting fiance Jennifer to lay down the law and Russell to seek revenge. Meanwhile, Jeff learns an important lesson about sleep deprivation.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Sister
programme.desc: A surprise visit from Audrey's sister Barbara opens a window of opportunity for Russell to prove that beauty is more than what meets the eye - or at least a function of personality and good strategy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Guy Code
programme.desc: In an effort to beef up their social agenda, Audrey persuades Jeff to double-date, which inadvertently puts the rules governed by the 'guy code' versus the 'marriage code' to the test.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Engagement Party
programme.desc: In an effort to capitalize on his commitment to Jennifer, Adam convinces Jeff to host an engagement party, which ultimately provides a lesson in 'giving' and 'receiving.' Audrey gains an unsolicited insight into her sister Barbara's single life.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Bag Ladies
programme.desc: Russell realizes the cost of dating a 'bag lady,' while Adam experiences the social peril of yielding to Jennifer's wishes and sporting a 'man bag.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old School Jeff
programme.desc: Jeff is given an opportunity to 'live it up' during a night out on the town, landing Russell in hot water and Adam to reflect on the details surrounding his impending nuptials.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fix-Ups and Downs
programme.desc: Jennifer and Audrey practice their match-making skills and inadvertently end up date-less while Adam and Jeff score financial gain in the process. Meanwhile, Russell tries a new tactic at 'fixing himself up.'.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Visit from Fay
programme.desc: A visit from Adam's free-spirited mother puts Jennifer's patience to the test and teaches Russell an embarrassing lesson about 'art'. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey find themselves enjoying alternative forms of entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Time Share
programme.desc: Jeff makes plans to take Audrey away for the weekend to a fancy hotel, even though they’ll have to sit through a time share presentation to get a great deal.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(n)

programme.title: Time Runners
programme.desc: Special Agent Sally Biggs has a secret, she can rewind time whenever she wants. It's enough to make her a celebrity at the FBI and allows her to control almost everything in her life... Except for the disappearance of her husband.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Grimm: Time Wars
programme.desc: An Evil Queen enlists Rumpelstiltskin to help her send the Avengers Grimm back in time. The Avengers will need to work together if they are to return to the present and thwart the Queen before she can carry out her evil plan.(n)

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.(n)

programme.title: Relative Values
programme.desc: When a star and Hollywood Diva Miranda Frayle brek up, a playboy prince with a stiff upper lip sweeps her off her feet and boldly takes her home to meet his high class society minded mother.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: Rob Zombie's Halloween
programme.desc: Michael Meyers is released from the mental institution where he was committed for 17 years, and goes on a rampage to find his younger sister. No one is safe.(n)

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: A team of scientists are gathered to prevent a global catastrophe. But one of the scientists realizes early on that the cause of volcanic reactions is most likely due to a secret government operation investigating alternative energy resources.(n)

programme.title: 2012: Ice Age
programme.desc: When a volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier hurtling toward North America, a family struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.(n)

programme.title: Legend of the Red Dragon
programme.desc: A young father and his infant son are beset by forces of evil and corruption. They wander China, upholding their sense of honor and protecting the weak. When they are forced into combat, spectacular and hilarious fast-motion kung fu sequences follow.(n)

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne, and Beverley Mitchell. Personal shopper Gwen's new client is a workaholic single father. When Gwen meets his 7-year-old son, she makes their lacking father-son relationship her Christmas mission.(n)

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: Laura, a single mom meets a fellow single dad Ben, who enlists her help in taking care of a cute corgi puppy he plans to give to his daughter at Christmas. Through all the chaos, Lauren gets the chance to finally experience the holiday spirit.(n)

programme.title: The Loss Adjuster
programme.desc: Hapless Insurance Loss Adjuster - Martin Dyer - feels his life is spiralling out of control but discovers that even when you reach rock bottom, that some clouds really do have a silver lining.(n)

programme.title: Inspired To Kill
programme.desc: When an aspiring mystery writer finds a perfect mentor, she finds herself in an all too real story of murder.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Pretend You Don't See Her
programme.desc: As she lay dying, a woman gives the only witness to her murder her daughter's journal, implying that her attacker may also be responsible for her child's death. Before giving the journal to the police, the witness makes a copy for herself.(n)

programme.title: Eve Of Abduction
programme.desc: When single mom Stephanie gets engaged to single dad Jameson she receives an anonymous stalker’s threat: "Break off the engagement or I’ll kidnap your daughter!" The threats continue and her daughter is taken….(n)

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.(n)

programme.title: Drive Angry 3D
programme.desc: A brutal felon escapes from hell and, with police and a satanic henchman on his trail, sets out to avenge his daughter's murder and save his grandchild from bloodthirsty cultists.(n)
A writer (John Cusack) who specializes in debunking supernatural phenomena experiences true terror when he spends a night in a reputedly haunted room of a hotel.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Confidence Man
programme.desc: A young man arrives in Tombstone looking for Evangeline Murphy. But a look at her picture tells John Clum she is really Evie Marlowe, a saloon singer.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Toughest Judge in Arizona
programme.desc: A robbery starts a series of events that lead Johnny Ringo to kidnap Judge Spicer to release his cousin Charlie Parks from jail.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: My Enemy - John Behan
programme.desc: After Wells Fargo is robbed and an agent killed, Thacker pressures Earp to capture the killers.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Wyatt's Bitterest Enemy
programme.desc: The heat on the Ten Percent Ring has reached Washington, who is considering a new territorial governor.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Truth About Old Man Clanton
programme.sub-title: The Truth About Old Man Clanton
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp heads south to make peace when he learns that Old Man Clanton has sent his men into Mexico to rob the silver trains and steal the cattle of wealthy Mexican rancher Don Sebastian.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Doctor
programme.desc: During a robbery, Doc Goodfellow is shot accidentally by the Hewitt gang. But Doc Holliday says a real surgeon is needed to remove the bullet.(n)

programme.title: John Wayne: Guns Along The Trail
programme.desc: A government agent goes undercover in a traveling medicine show to infiltrate a gang of counterfeiters. In Vibrant Color! Starring: John Wayne, Marion Burns, Reed Howes.(n)

programme.title: Can't Be Heaven
programme.desc: A young boy struggles to cope with adolescence without a father to guide him, but a friendly ghost helps him to face up to change and he receives an important lesson in love.(n)

programme.title: A Doggone Adventure
programme.desc: Just Jesse the Jack Russell and a group of junior detectives find things get very mysterious when they find themselves entangled in a world of UFOs and secret agents. A Doggone Adventure is a rip roaring, fast paced adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: LEGEND OF KUNG FU RABBIT
programme.desc: In order to keep his promise to the ageing kung fu master, Fu, the lovable rabbit, must embark on a heroic quest to rescue young Penny and defeat the villainous panda Slash.(n)

programme.title: School for Scoundrels (2006)
programme.desc: A young guy short on luck enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when his teacher has the same agenda.(n)

programme.title: Olympic Dreams
programme.desc: In this heart-warming romantic comedy, an athlete and volunteer form an unexpected bond at the Olympic Games.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Behind the Headlines
programme.desc: When a blackmailing showgirl is murdered, reporters Pam Barnes and Paul Banner find themselves plunged into a twilight world of crime and conspiracy as they seek to track down the blonde schemer's killer.(n)

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: Romantic complications in the form of angry children threaten the romance between a gangster's widow and a businessman.(n)

programme.title: The Embezzler
programme.desc: A quiet, respectable, henpecked bank cashier learns that he has only a few years left to live. He decides to embezzle money from the bank where he works and enjoy the rest of his days in South America.(n)

programme.title: The Hideout
programme.desc: An insurance investigator has a chance encounter with the sister of a fur dealer and soon finds himself embroiled in intrigue involving a case filled with cash as well as a potential outbreak of anthrax.(n)

programme.title: Cottage to Let
programme.desc: Nazis try to learn the plans and location of a secret bomb sight in Scotland from an Allied scientist.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Girls (REDUX)
programme.desc: When a wealthy socialite and his two daughters book the Tulip for a passage to Mars, Percy and the destructive young women become fast friends, creating serious trouble for Dante.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Bad Seed (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante is abducted by an Orchard agent (Tosca), in an effort to track down Travis. Tosca believes that he is the key to the Divinity Cluster.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Travis (REDUX)
programme.desc: Dante finally finds his son, Travis, but the Raider that raised him stands between father and son reuniting, as the Earth's future hangs in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Resurrection (REDUX)
programme.desc: Eccleston returns from "the other side" just as Raider forces attack the Tulip... on their way to destroy what is left of the Earth.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: The Collector
programme.desc: Johnny's (Anthony Michael Hall) visions of a young girl's abduction lead him on a life-and-death race to find the collector (Brian Markinson), a disturbed man who kidnaps and indoctrinates young women.(n)

programme.title: The Dead Zone: Double Vision
programme.desc: Johnny's (Anthony Michael Hall) ability to alter fate is put to the test when he meets a young woman (Jennifer Finnigan) with psychic abilities of her own.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crossfire
programme.desc: As the election draws near, Liam believes Zo'or is trying to have Jonathan Doors murdered. The Resistance worries that an attack is imminent at the final debate. Julia mobilizes a group to protect Doors against Liam's wishes.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Crackdown
programme.desc: An unknown woman saves Augur and Liam from the raids on the Resistance. Lili sabotages the mother ship, but Zo'or stops its total destruction. Lili is reportedly dead. The investigation on the President's shooter continues.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Vanished
programme.desc: Some who were detained during the Resistance sweep have not reappeared after their release. Lili is taken to a lab run by Sandoval and implanted. Renee tries to help Liam find the missing people.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Emancipation
programme.desc: A group posing as volunteers attacks using a stolen skrill prototype that does not require an implant to control. It is discovered that the skrill queen is also missing. The investigation leads to a resistance group called Black Wednesday.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 1
programme.desc: When the Sanctuary is approached by an abnormal leader about a radical plan for peace, Magnus goes all in and pledges her full support. However, when Will is forced to leave the Sanctuary, his decision may just put everyone at risk.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Sanctuary for None Pt 2
programme.desc: SCIU has surrounded the 5th Ward with troops and an electric shield that prevents them from leaving. Caleb has a virus that can turn the human population into abnormals. Magnus enacts her ultimate plan for the Sanctuary network.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)
